item.description:
The film that opens the Boston Film Festival is To Be Friends. Written and directed by Jim Eckhart and produced by Aaron Eckhart - I'm guessing this is a brother act, since Aaron's father is called Jim Senior.

Synopsis:
This story of how requited love orchestrates one last chance for two life long friends to explore the boundaries and connections of their relationship, finally finding love just as it is lost forever.
item.how_to_find_us: Following the movie I'll be in the front of the theatre to gather the troops. Then we'll go somewhere close to chow down and chat.
item.name: BFF Opening Night - To Be Friends
